application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The applicant has not adequately demonstrated that condition 4 (Refuse and Recycling) of planning permission 22/01510/FUL can be discharged. Before condition 4 (Refuse and Recycling) of planning permission 22/01510/FUL can be discharged, Kingston Council need details submitted showing how refuse and recycling is to be stored within the premises and need to be provide with the detail of the means by which it will be taken from the site. The required information shall include details of secure storage containers to ensure that refuse and recycling is suitably contained during storage within the premises and when it is taken from the site, in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
